PHRASE.LANG: Force de frappe Cyber Corp. - Lot 01
Fuerza de ataque Cyber Corp. - Pack 01

Having trouble competing in the marketplace?
 Wish your rivals were out of the picture?
 Redefine "hostile takeover" with our new cybernetic body replacements today! Cyber Corp. - Fixing nature's mistakes since 2327.
 
 These locomotion objects will boost your speed.
 
 Speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25m/s
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Cyber Corp. Strike Force - Assault - Red
 (2) Cyber Corp. Strike Force - Assault - Black
 (3) Cyber Corp. Strike Force - Assassin - Red
 (4) Cyber Corp. Strike Force - Assassin - Black
 
 ※These items are portable items. [#Legal]
